content.body: now I’m confused by the statement *“you can think of a `WeakSet` as a special case of `WeakMap` where all the values are booleans”* in https://v8.dev/features/weak-references
content.formatted_body: now I’m confused by the statement “you can think of a WeakSet as a special case of WeakMap where all the values are booleans” in https://v8.dev/features/weak-references

content.body: I see nothing in the spec for `WeakSet` at https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/keyed-collections.html#sec-weakset-objects about the values being restricted to being booleans
content.formatted_body: I see nothing in the spec for WeakSet at https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/keyed-collections.html#sec-weakset-objects about the values being restricted to being booleans
